value:
$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Aha!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Lady Altina... Lady Sanaki...$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|We finally found you, Sephiran.
Why did you run off like that?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Winter20,Face|What's this? Looks like something
serious, maybe...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭フェリクス,ch17_14_Felix_M_Winter20,Face|Let's avoid getting involved in the
affairs of others... And you! Don't
go running away again.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭ベルナデッタ,ch17_10_Bernadeta_F_Winter20,Face|I just want to go back to my room!
Is that so much to ask...$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_MNS_FE09_06,0|$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Please forgive me for my unseemly
behavior, Lady Altina...$k$pI am Lady Sanaki's servant. My name
is Sephiran.$k$p$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Sephiran? No... But you—$k$pYet it cannot be...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|What troubles you so?$k$p$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|You are the splitting image of him...
Someone whose face I know well.
He who I held dear above all else.$k$p...Could it be? Could you be—$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Forgive me, Lady Altina, but...I am
from the same age as Lady Sanaki.$k$pHow could I have met you, who lived
so long ago?$k$p$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|I suppose you have a point...$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Now then. Lady Sanaki, do mind
the hour while you're out. It would
not do for you to stay out too late.$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Hmph...$k$pHey, Sephiran! Get back here!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|...Yes, Lady Sanaki?$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|The three of us are going to enjoy
the festivities together for the
remainder of the evening.$k$pI, Sanaki, Apostle of Begnion, have
decreed it! Do not protest.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|What brought on this sudden
desire of yours?$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|I do not know, but...I know it must
be done, somehow.$k$pI refuse to take another step until
you agree to come along!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Lady Sanaki...$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Ah-choo!$k$pWhat will it be, Sephiran?! If I stand
still for too long in this weather, I'm
sure to catch cold!$k$pAre you not concerned for my
well-being, Sephiran?!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|Ever the incorrigible one, you are...
I understand, my lady, and I will join
you two this evening.$k$p$WmMPID_サナキ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Wonderful! Then let's be on our way,
shall we? I still have a long list of
sights I hope to see tonight.$k$pAnd when we are finished with those,
we'll dine at the castle. A warm meal
by the fire... I can't wait!$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭セフェラン,ch09_23_Sepheran_M_Winter20,Face|As you wish, of course. Let us begin
our festival tour, shall we? After you,
Lady Altina.$k$p$WmMPID_双界オルティナ,ch11_16_Ortina_FF_Pair,Face|Oh, thank you...Sephiran...$k$p$Sbs150|
